statements: SELECT * FROM stores WHERE store_id = 100
SELECT store_name, location FROM stores WHERE store_id > 50
SELECT store_id, store_name FROM stores WHERE location IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM stores ORDER BY store_name DESC
SELECT store_id, store_name, location FROM stores
SELECT store_id, store_name, location FROM stores WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT store_name, store_id, location FROM stores WHERE store_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM stores ORDER BY store_id DESC;
SELECT store_name AS Name, store_id AS ID, ST_AsText(location) AS Location FROM stores WHERE ST_Distance(location, ST_GeomFromText('POINT(1 1)')) < 10;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location FROM stores WHERE ST_Contains(ST_GeomFromText('POLYGON((0 0, 0 5, 5 5, 5 0, 0 0))'), location);
SELECT * FROM stores;
SELECT store_name, location FROM stores WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location FROM stores WHERE store_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_id*2 AS location_double FROM locations;
SELECT * FROM stores;
SELECT store_name, location FROM stores WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT store_id, store_name FROM stores WHERE location <@ 'POINT(0 0)';
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, ST_AsText(coordinates) FROM locations WHERE ST_Distance(coordinates, 'POINT(0 0)') < 10;
SELECT * FROM stores;
SELECT store_id, store_name FROM stores WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location FROM stores WHERE store_name LIKE '%mart%';
SELECT store_id, location_id, distance FROM distances WHERE distance < 10 ORDER BY store_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM stores ORDER BY store_name ASC;
SELECT store_id, store_name, ST_AsText(location) AS location FROM stores WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, geopoint FROM locations WHERE location_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT store_name, location_name, distance FROM stores INNER JOIN distances ON stores.store_id = distances.store_id INNER JOIN locations ON locations.location_id = distances.location_id;
SELECT DISTINCT store_id, COUNT(location_id) AS num_locations FROM distances GROUP BY store_id HAVING num_locations > 1 ORDER BY num_locations DESC;
SELECT * FROM stores;
SELECT store_name, location FROM stores ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT store_id, store_name, manager_name FROM stores WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_location FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT store_id, product_id, quantity FROM store_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location, manager_name FROM stores WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT store_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM store_inventory GROUP BY store_id;
SELECT customer_id, store_id, distance FROM distances WHERE distance < 10 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT store_id, store_name, location, manager_name FROM stores JOIN store_inventory ON stores.store_id = store_inventory.store_id;
SELECT * FROM stores;
SELECT store_name, location FROM stores ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT store_id, product_id, quantity FROM store_inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT * FROM stores WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT store_name, location FROM stores WHERE location.STDistance(geography::STPoint(40.7128, -74.0060)) < 1000;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT store_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM stores s JOIN store_inventory i ON s.store_id = i.store_id GROUP BY store_name;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
